betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§4§l§oWell that was a bit weird, but hey, you beat whatever that thing was! 

What's that, you think my voice is different than usual? It's probably your imagination...

Why did I say "You fool"? Oh you heard that? That's a bit awkard... 

Anyways, it seems like that thing was the root of all those §r§6§l§oDimensional Shifts§r§4§l§o, so we did it! You saved all of the realms!

I think I should be able to reverse the effects, but I need a powerful catalyst to do so.

Can you give me the sword that thing dropped? Since it was closest to the source of all the chaos it should work...
